title: DataEnvelope
description: Metadata for the data transfered through the AF-Connect service.

EnvelopeType.title: EnvelopeType
EnvelopeType.description: A collection of data describing the source of the data.

SourceType.title: SourceType
SourceType.description: Contains structured information about a candidate, including information about their past experiences (Work History, Education History, etc). This information can be used for evaluation or submission of candidacy for a position opening or resource requirement.

sourceId.description: The primary identifier of the source of the data.

allowsWrite.description: Indicator showing if the source allows write back.

consentTimestamp.description: The time and date the consent was given. If the consent has been changed multiple times this shows the latest one.

consentRevokedTimestamp.description: If the concent was revoked this shows the timestamp of the revokation. If the consent has been revoked multiple times this shows the latest one.

consentedTimePeriod.description: The time period the user has given consent for their data to be accesicle. If this amount of time has traverced from the time the concent was changed to yes then it is automatically changed to no and the action is recorded in the rest of this data structure as well.

DataType.title: DataType
DataType.description: Details about the data stransefered. TODO add the name of the structure/document type,

size.description: the size of the pachage being transfered in MB.

documentType.description: Since this is envisioned to be a data agnistic envelope it is better to show here what kind of data is being tranfered. In this case this will most likely be DV data but can also be certificates or insurance infromation.

dataStructureLink.description: Link to the location of the data structure of the data sent.
